author: windexh8er
content: Or...  It was nothing and it was just a flat out phishing attack: http://googleonlinesecurity.blogspot.com/2008/11/gmail-security-and-recent-phishing.html

author: Chris Evans
content: Just a quick note to say that the recent domain thefts were traced to a phishing scam, not a Gmail bug. We blogged about it here: http://googleonlinesecurity.blogspot.com/2008/11/gmail-security-and-recent-phishing.html

content: I guess the KISS principles always apply :)
